\begin{document}
\textcyr{\char193\char229\char235\char251\char233} \textcyr{\char205\char232\char234\char238\char235\char224\char233},
16210, 09.10.2016


\section{\textcyr{\char206\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char229\char237\char232\char255}}
\begin{enumerate}
\item \textcyr{\char192\char225\char241\char238\char235\char254\char242\char237\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char235\char232\char247\char232\char237\char224}:
\[
|x|=\begin{cases}
-x, & x<0\\
x, & x\geqslant0
\end{cases}
\]

\item \textcyr{\char209\char247\char229\char242\char237\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
--- \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238},
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char238\char236\char238\char249\char237\char238\char229}
\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}, \textcyr{\char242}. \textcyr{\char229}. \textcyr{\char253\char235\char229\char236\char229\char237\char242\char251}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char237\char243\char236\char229\char240\char238\char226\char224\char242\char252}.
\item \textcyr{\char202\char238\char237\char242\char232\char237\char243\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
--- \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238},
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char238\char236\char238\char249\char237\char238\char229}
\ensuremath{\mathbb{R}}.
\item \textcyr{\char206\char225\char240\char224\char231} \textcyr{\char238\char242\char238\char225\char240\char224\char230\char229\char237\char232\char255}
--- \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char235\char224\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char231\char237\char224\char247\char229\char237\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char234\char246\char232\char232}.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char240\char238\char238\char225\char240\char224\char231}
\textcyr{\char238\char242\char238\char225\char240\char224\char230\char229\char237\char232\char255}
--- \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char235\char224\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char229\char237\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char234\char246\char232\char232}.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}:
\textcyr{\char215\char232\char241\char235\char238\char226\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252\char254}
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char235\char254\char225\char238\char229} \textcyr{\char238\char242\char238\char225\char240\char224\char230\char229\char237\char232\char229}
$f:\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\rightarrow\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{R}}}$.
\item \textcyr{\char194\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
(\textcyr{\char241\char242\char240\char238\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}):
$\forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ x_{n}<x_{n+1}$.
\item \textcyr{\char211\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
(\textcyr{\char241\char242\char240\char238\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}):
$\forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ x_{n}>x_{n+1}$.
\item \textcyr{\char209\char242\char240\char238\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238} \textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255},
\textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238} \textcyr{\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}.
\item \textcyr{\char205\char229\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
(\textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}):
$\forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ x_{n}\geqslant x_{n+1}$.
\item \textcyr{\char205\char229\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
(\textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}):
\textcyr{\char205\char224\char228\char238} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char225\char224\char226\char232\char242\char252}$\forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ x_{n}\leqslant x_{n+1}$.
\item \textcyr{\char204\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char229\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255},
\textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char229\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}.
\item \textcyr{\char209\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char237\char232\char230\char237\char255\char255} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char224}
(\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235}. \textcyr{\char238\char227\char240}.
\textcyr{\char241\char237\char232\char231\char243}): $\exists\varepsilon\in\left\{ a_{n}\right\} \ |\ \forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}\geqslant\varepsilon$.
\textcyr{\char206\char242\char240}.: $\forall\varepsilon\in\left\{ a_{n}\right\} \ |\ \exists n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}<\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char210\char238\char247\char237\char224\char255} \textcyr{\char237\char232\char230\char237\char255\char255}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char252} (\textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char225\char238\char235\char252\char248\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char237\char232\char230\char237\char255\char255} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char224}):
\[
\inf\ \{a_{n}\}=A\Leftrightarrow\begin{cases}
1) & \exists A\ |\ \forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}\geqslant A\\
2) & \forall A'>A\ \exists a_{n}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ a_{n}<A'
\end{cases}
\]

\item \textcyr{\char209\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char245\char237\char255\char255}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char224}
(\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235}. \textcyr{\char238\char227\char240}.
\textcyr{\char241\char226\char229\char240\char245\char243}): $\exists\varepsilon\in\left\{ a_{n}\right\} \ |\ \forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}\leqslant\varepsilon$.
\textcyr{\char206\char242\char240}.: $\forall\varepsilon\in\left\{ a_{n}\right\} \ |\ \exists n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}>\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char210\char238\char247\char237\char224\char255} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char245\char237\char255\char255}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char252} (\textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char236\char229\char237\char252\char248\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char245\char237\char255\char255}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char224}):
\[
\sup\ \{a_{n}\}=A\Leftrightarrow\begin{cases}
1) & \exists A\ |\ \forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ a_{n}\leqslant A\\
2) & \forall A'\text{<}A\ \exists a_{n}\ |\ a_{n}>A'
\end{cases}
\]

\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char238\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char247\char229\char237\char224}:
$\exists M>0\ |\ \forall n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |a_{n}|<M$.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char237\char229\char238\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char247\char229\char237\char224}:
$\forall M>0\ \exists n\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ |a_{n}|\geqslant M$.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}:
$\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=A\ \Leftrightarrow\ \forall\varepsilon>0\ \exists n_{0}\in\mathbb{N}\ |\ \forall n>n_{0}\ |a_{n}-A|<\varepsilon$
.
\item \textcyr{\char209\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238\char241\char242\char252}:
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char242\char241\char255},
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232} \textcyr{\char238\char237\char224}
\textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char229\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}: 
\[
\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=A\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{R}}}\ \Leftrightarrow\ \forall\varepsilon>0\ \exists n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ \forall n>n_{0}\ |a_{n}-A|<\varepsilon,\ A\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{R}}}
\]

\item \textcyr{\char208\char224\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238\char241\char242\char252}:
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char242\char241\char255},
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232} \textcyr{\char243} \textcyr{\char237\char229\char229}
\textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238} \textcyr{\char225\char229\char241\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}, \textcyr{\char235\char232\char225\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235} \textcyr{\char237\char229}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}.
\item \textcyr{\char193\char229\char241\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char236\char224\char235\char224\char255} ($a_{n}\rightarrow0$):
$\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=0\ \Leftrightarrow\ \forall\varepsilon>0\ \exists n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ \forall n>n_{0}\ |a_{n}|<\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char205\char229} \textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char225\char229\char241\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char236\char224\char235\char238\char233}: $\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}\neq0\ \Leftrightarrow\ \exists\varepsilon>0\ |\ \forall n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ \exists n>n_{0}\ |\ |a_{n}|\geqslant\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char193\char229\char241\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char225\char238\char235\char252\char248\char224\char255}
($a_{n}\rightarrow\infty$): $\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=\infty\ \Leftrightarrow\ \forall\varepsilon>0\ \exists n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ \forall n>n_{0}\ |a_{n}|>\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char205\char229} \textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char225\char229\char241\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char225\char238\char235\char252\char248\char238\char233}:
$\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}\neq\infty\ \Leftrightarrow\exists\varepsilon>0\ |\ \forall n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ \exists n>n_{0}\ |\ |a_{n}|\leqslant\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char210\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char224}
\textcyr{\char238} \textcyr{\char231\char224\char230\char224\char242\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}:
\textcyr{\char197\char241\char235\char232} $\forall n\ b_{n}\leqslant a_{n}\leqslant c_{n}$,
\textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232} $\text{n\ensuremath{\rightarrow\infty}}$:
$\lim b_{n}=\lim c_{n}=A\ \Rightarrow\ \lim a_{n}=A.$
\item \textcyr{\char210\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char224}
\textcyr{\char194\char229\char233\char229\char240\char248\char242\char240\char224\char241\char241\char224}:
\textcyr{\char203\char254\char225\char224\char255} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char237\char238\char242\char238\char237\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255}
(\textcyr{\char243\char225\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char224\char255})
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char238\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char247\char229\char237\char237\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char241\char226\char229\char240\char245\char243} (\textcyr{\char241\char237\char232\char231\char243})
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char228\char224\char236\char229\char237\char242\char224\char235\char252\char237\char224},
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232} $\forall\varepsilon>0\ \exists n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ \forall m,n>n_{0}\ |a_{m}-a_{n}|<\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char228\char224\char236\char229\char237\char242\char224\char235\char252\char237\char224},
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232} $\exists\varepsilon>0\ \forall n_{0}\in\text{\ensuremath{\mathbb{N}}}\ |\ \exists m,n>n_{0}\ |a_{m}-a_{n}|\geqslant\varepsilon$.
\item \textcyr{\char202\char240\char232\char242\char229\char240\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char202\char238\char248\char232}: $\{a_{n}\}$ --- \textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char228\char224\char236\char229\char237\char242\char224\char235\char252\char237\char224}
$\Leftrightarrow\ \{a_{n}\}$ --- \textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235} (\textcyr{\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char242\char241\char255}).
\item \textcyr{\char206\char242\char240\char232\char246\char224\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char234\char240\char232\char242\char229\char240\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char202\char238\char248\char232}: $\{a_{n}\}$ --- \textcyr{\char237\char229}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char228\char224\char236\char229\char237\char242\char224\char235\char252\char237\char224}
$\Leftrightarrow\ \{a_{n}\}$ --- \textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char224}
(\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char242\char241\char255}).
\item \textcyr{\char207\char238\char228\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}:
$\{a_{n_{k}}\}$ --- \textcyr{\char239\char238\char228\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char252}
$\{a_{n}\}$, \textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232}$\ \{n_{k}\}$
--- \textcyr{\char241\char242\char240\char238\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240}.
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235}.
\item \textcyr{\char215\char224\char241\char242\char232\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}: \textcyr{\char197\char241\char235\char232}
$\lim_{k\rightarrow\infty}a_{n_{k}}=A$, \textcyr{\char242\char238}
$A$ --- \textcyr{\char247\char224\char241\char242\char232\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}
$\{a_{n}\}$.
\item \textcyr{\char205\char232\char230\char237\char232\char233} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char236\char229\char237\char252\char248\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char247\char224\char241\char242\char232\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}:
\[
\underline{\lim}_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=\inf_{n\rightarrow\infty}\left\{ \lim_{k\rightarrow\infty}a_{n_{k}}\right\} 
\]

\item \textcyr{\char194\char229\char240\char245\char237\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char225\char238\char235\char252\char248\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char247\char224\char241\char242\char232\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235}:
\[
\overline{\lim}_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=\sup_{n\rightarrow\infty}\left\{ \lim_{k\rightarrow\infty}a_{n_{k}}\right\} 
\]

\item \textcyr{\char205\char229\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char241\char242\char224\char242\char238\char247\char237\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char243\char241\char235\char238\char226\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238\char226\char224\char237\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char224}:
$\underline{\lim}_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}=\overline{\lim}_{n\rightarrow\infty}a_{n}$.
\item \textcyr{\char210\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char224}
\textcyr{\char193\char238\char235\char252\char246\char224\char237\char238}-\textcyr{\char194\char229\char233\char229\char240\char248\char242\char240\char224\char241\char241\char224}:
\textcyr{\char200\char231} \textcyr{\char238\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char247\char229\char237\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235}. \textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char228\char229\char235\char232\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char245\char238\char228\char255\char249\char243\char254\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char228\char239\char238\char241\char235}.
\item \textcyr{\char215\char232\char241\char235\char238} $e=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}\left(1+\frac{1}{n}\right)^{n}$.
\item \textcyr{\char206\char234\char240\char229\char241\char242\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252\char254}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232} $\ x_{0}$ \textcyr{\char237\char224}
\textcyr{\char247\char232\char241\char235\char238\char226\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}, \textcyr{\char243\char228\char224\char235\char229\char237\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char238\char242} $x_{0}$ \textcyr{\char236\char229\char237\char229\char229}
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char237\char224} $\varepsilon$,
\textcyr{\char242}. \textcyr{\char229}. $O_{\varepsilon}(x_{0})=\{x\ |\ |x-x_{0}|<\varepsilon\}$.\end{enumerate}
